description: Grant funding agreements and contracts issued to providers for 2019 to 2020 academic year.

attachments.title: Higher education institutions adult contract for services: higher level apprenticeships
Contract for services: adult education budget (procured)
Education and training 2014 2017 contract for services extension

details.body:
This page contains funding agreements and contracts for 2019 to 2020. For agreements and contracts relating to other years, see the ESFA funding agreements and contracts collection page.

Details

These contracts for services are extensions of the 2018 to 2019 versions. However, 2019 to 2020 further education funding is contracted using a new contract framework. You can find the details of this on the ESFA education and skills contracts 2019 to 2020 page.

We have replicated the main clauses in the new contract framework in these contracts for services so that there is consistency across funding for both parties.

The contracts set out:

  • the obligations of the education and training provider in return for receiving public funding from the department
  • the circumstances in which the department will take intervention action in the event of educational, financial or other failure of the provider

Higher education institutions adult contract for services: higher level apprenticeships
